summary: An Ordinance providing for the condemnation and appropriation of a portion of Block Forty-four (44) and a portion of Block Forty-six (46), Yesler's Third Addition to the City of Seattle, for park and parkway purposes; and providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property, and for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensation to be made for the private property to be taken or damaged.
